doc.field: Leo Wollman collection of Coney Island photographs
Leo Wollman collection of Coney Island photographs

The Leo Wollman collection of Coney Island photographs contains two photographic prints showing views of Coney Island, circa 1930. One photograph is a 5 x 7 inch black-and-white informal group portrait showing two unidentified men seated in a two-person ride. The second photograph is an oversized black-and-white panoramic view showing swimmers in a pool at Steeplechase Park.
